pizzaList.name: Margherita
pizzaList.description: A hugely popular margherita, with a deliciously tangy single cheese topping

pizzaList.name: Double Cheese Margheritta
pizzaList.description: The ever-popular Margherita - loaded with extra cheese... oodies of it!

pizzaList.name: Chicken Golden Delight
pizzaList.description: Mmm! Barbeque chicken with a topping of golden corn loaded with extra cheese. Worth its weight in gold!

pizzaList.name: Non Veg Supreme
pizzaList.description: Bite into supreme delight of Black Olives, Onions, Grilled Mushrooms, Pepper BBQ Chicken, Peri-Peri Chicken, Grilled Chicken Rashers

pizzaList.name: Chicken Dominator
pizzaList.description: Treat your taste buds with Double Pepper Barbecue Chicken, Peri-Peri Chicken, Chicken Tikka & Grilled Chicken Rashers

pizzaList.name: Chicken Fiesta
pizzaList.description: Dominos introduces 'Chicken Fiesta' an exotic new Pizza. Topped with Chunky Chicken, Capsicum & Onions.
